explanation: [0-0] A young man in a red and black shirt and a woman in a blue dress are sitting on a gray sofa. The man is reaching into an open bag of yellow potato chips on a clear glass table in front of him. Various plush toys are on the sofa behind them.
[0-3] The man takes a chip out of the bag in front of him, puts his left hand under his mouth to catch the crumbs, and then puts the crumbs back into the bag. The woman is watching him.

[3-10] Finally, the man grabs the bag of chips with both hands and walks to the right. The woman reaches out to stop him, but it is too late. The scene cuts to the man putting the chips in a white wall cabinet, which is filled with many bags of chips. After putting the chips away, the man turns his head and shows a horrified expression. The scene cuts back to the woman, who is squatting on the ground, pointing at a pile of chip crumbs on the table in front of her, then looks up at the camera angrily.
